input.sentences: my friends and i decided to have a karaoke night !
some people had to be forced to sing .
people were also enjoying some drinks .
the karaoke night was a great idea !
output.sentences: Tom had an announcement to make about Jeff and Sarah.
Sarah lost a bet and was forced to make out with Jeff in front of everyone.
Sabrina thought this was hilarious, so she took a picture.
Some other people didn't think it was so funny, so they drank beer and studied the wine list.
Chuck was stoned out of his mind, though, and thought Jeff and Sarah's make out session was awesome.
